TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebSocket extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class WebSocket Implements IDisposable
public ref class WebSocket abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: WebSocket 類別允許應用程式在 WebSocket 升級完成之後傳送和接收資料。

span.span: The WebSocket class allows applications to send and receive data after the WebSocket upgrade has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的某些類別Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 上支援命名空間。Some of the classes in the namespace are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008. 不過，Windows 8 和 Windows Server 2012 上支援的用戶端和伺服器 WebSockets 只有 public 的實作。However, the only public implementations of client and server WebSockets are supported on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012. 類別和類別中的項目Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 支援的命名空間是抽象類別。The classes and class elements in the namespace that are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008 are abstract classes. 這可讓應用程式開發人員，繼承與延伸的用戶端 Websocket 的實際實作這些抽象類別。This allows an application developer to inherit and extend these abstract classes with an actual implementation of client WebSockets.

summary.span: 中止 WebSocket 連接，並取消任何暫止的 IO 作業。

span.span: Aborts the WebSocket connection and cancels any pending IO operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseAsync (System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseAsync(valuetype System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

abstract member CloseAsync : System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus * string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

param.name: closeStatus
param.span: 表示關閉 WebSocket 連接的原因。

span.span: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.

param.name: statusDescription
param.span: 指定人類看得懂的說明，解釋為何關閉連線。

span.span: Specifies a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 可用來傳播應該取消作業之通知的語彙基元。

span.span: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.

summary.span: 以非同步作業使用 [WebSocket 通訊協定規格](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06)第 7 節中所定義的關閉信號交換，關閉 WebSocket 連接。

span.span: Closes the WebSocket connection as an asynchronous operation using the close handshake defined in the [WebSocket protocol specification](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06) section 7.
Returns .

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回WebSocket 關閉之後，物件會完成。The returned object will complete after the WebSocket has been closed. 這個方法關閉 WebSocket 連接使用中定義的關閉信號交換[WebSocket 通訊協定規格](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06)第 7 節。This method closes the WebSocket connection using the close handshake defined in the [WebSocket protocol specification](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06) section 7.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseOutputAsync (System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseOutputAsync(valuetype System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

param.name: closeStatus
param.span: 表示關閉 WebSocket 連接的原因。

span.span: Indicates the reason for closing the WebSocket connection.

param.name: statusDescription
param.span: 可讓應用程式指定人類看得懂的說明，解釋為何關閉連線。

span.span: Allows applications to specify a human readable explanation as to why the connection is closed.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 可用來傳播應該取消作業之通知的語彙基元。

span.span: The token that can be used to propagate notification that operations should be canceled.

summary.span: 啟始或完成 [WebSocket 通訊協定規格第 7 節](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06)中定義的關閉信號交換。

span.span: Initiates or completes the close handshake defined in the [WebSocket protocol specification section 7](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-hybi-thewebsocketprotocol-06).
Returns .

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回當物件在 WebSocket 上的輸出已關閉之後，會完成。The returned object will complete after the output on the WebSocket has been closed.

summary.span: 表示遠端端點已起始關閉訊號交換的原因。

span.span: Indicates the reason why the remote endpoint initiated the close handshake.
Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未起始關閉訊號交換，則會傳回 WebSocketCloseStatus.None。If the close handshake has not been initiated yet, WebSocketCloseStatus.None is returned.

param.name: innerStream
param.span: 要用於 IO 作業的連接。

span.span: The connection to be used for IO operations.

param.name: subProtocol
param.span: 用戶端所接受的附屬通訊協定。

span.span: The subprotocol accepted by the client.

param.name: receiveBufferSize
param.span: 用戶端 WebSocket 接收緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket receive buffer.

param.name: sendBufferSize
param.span: 用戶端 WebSocket 傳送緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size in bytes of the client WebSocket send buffer.

param.name: keepAliveInterval
param.span: 決定如何定期在連線上傳送保持連接的框架。

span.span: Determines how regularly a frame is sent over the connection as a keep-alive.

param.span: 僅適用於連線處於閒置狀態時。

span.span: Applies only when the connection is idle.

param.name: useZeroMaskingKey
param.span: 表示隨機金鑰或靜態金鑰 (只是零) 是否應用於 WebSocket 遮罩。

span.span: Indicates whether a random key or a static key (just zeros) should be used for the WebSocket masking.

param.name: internalBuffer
param.span: 做為 WPC 中的內部緩衝區。

span.span: Will be used as the internal buffer in the WPC.

param.span: 大小必須至少為 2 \* ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20 (32 位元時為 16)。

span.span: The size has to be at least 2 \* ReceiveBufferSize + SendBufferSize + 256 + 20 (16 on 32-bit).

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件上收到資料之後，會完成。The returned object will complete after the data has been received on the . 只有一個傳送，另一個接收的每個支援以平行方式的物件。Exactly one send and one receive is supported on each object in parallel.
